Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.fsm

Interface Phase

All Known Implementing Classes:
EndGamePhase, EndTurnPhase, MoveMotherNaturePhase, MoveStudentPhase, PlanPhase, SelectCloudTilePhase, SuspendedPhase
public interface Phase
This interface describes a single FSM node about the basic actions that a player could do. In short terms, it maintains memory about what should be done following the correct game flow and changes the game selected player depending on what player should do what.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    isLegitAction(GameActionHandler handler, String playerName, BaseGameAction baseAction)
    This method decides based on the actual state if the arrived action should be executed or not.
    void
    onValidAction(GameActionHandler handler)
    This method changes the handler's internal state when a valid action is performed.

  • Method Details

    • onValidAction

      void onValidAction(GameActionHandler handler)
      This method changes the handler's internal state when a valid action is performed. With this method we can let the FSM proceed and therefore suggest the controller whether an action is legit.
      Parameters:
      handler - The game handler that contains the FSM state

    • isLegitAction

      boolean isLegitAction(GameActionHandler handler, String playerName, BaseGameAction baseAction)
      This method decides based on the actual state if the arrived action should be executed or not.
